description: React component for displaying and managing workflow progress, including step statuses, actions, and modals for pausing and requesting changes.

methods.name: statusKey
methods.description: Generates a localization key for a given workflow status.

methods.name: statusBadgeClass
methods.description: Returns CSS class names for status badges based on status and whether the step is current.

methods.name: canAdvance
methods.description: Checks if the current step can be advanced (approved).

methods.name: isPaused
methods.description: Checks if the current step is paused.
